verses.kjv: This know also, that in the last days perilous times shall come.
verses.web: But know this: that in the last days, grievous times will come.
verses.ct: Understand this: in the last days, dangerous times will come.

verses.kjv: For men shall be lovers of their own selves, covetous, boasters, proud, blasphemers, disobedient to parents, unthankful, unholy,
verses.web: For men will be lovers of self, lovers of money, boastful, arrogant, blasphemers, disobedient to parents, unthankful, unholy,
verses.ct: People will be obsessed with themselves, greedy for money, boastful, arrogant, abusive in their speech, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, and unholy.

verses.kjv: Without natural affection, trucebreakers, false accusers, incontinent, fierce, despisers of those that are good,
verses.web: without natural affection, unforgiving, slanderers, without self-control, fierce, not lovers of good,
verses.ct: They'll be without natural affection, unforgiving, slanderous, lacking any self-control, brutal, and hostile to anything good.

verses.kjv: Traitors, heady, highminded, lovers of pleasures more than lovers of God;
verses.web: traitors, headstrong, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God,
verses.ct: They'll be treacherous, reckless, swollen with pride — people who love pleasure more than they love God.

verses.kjv: Having a form of godliness, but denying the power thereof: from such turn away.
verses.web: holding a form of godliness, but having denied its power. Turn away from these, also.
verses.ct: They'll keep up an outward appearance of godliness but reject its real power. Stay away from people like that.

verses.kjv: For of this sort are they which creep into houses, and lead captive silly women laden with sins, led away with divers lusts,
verses.web: For some of these are people who creep into houses and take captive gullible women loaded down with sins, led away by various lusts,
verses.ct: Some of them worm their way into homes and manipulate vulnerable women who are weighed down by sin and driven by all kinds of desires —

verses.kjv: Ever learning, and never able to come to the knowledge of the truth.
verses.web: always learning, and never able to come to the knowledge of the truth.
verses.ct: women who are always trying to learn but never able to arrive at the knowledge of the truth.

verses.kjv: Now as Jannes and Jambres withstood Moses, so do these also resist the truth: men of corrupt minds, reprobate concerning the faith.
verses.web: Even as Jannes and Jambres opposed Moses, so these also oppose the truth, men corrupted in mind, who concerning the faith are rejected.
verses.ct: Just as Jannes and Jambres opposed Moses, these people oppose the truth. Their minds are corrupted, and their faith is counterfeit.

verses.kjv: But they shall proceed no further: for their folly shall be manifest unto all men, as theirs also was.
verses.web: But they will proceed no further. For their folly will be evident to all men, as theirs also came to be.
verses.ct: But they won't get very far, because their foolishness will become obvious to everyone — just as it did with Jannes and Jambres.

verses.kjv: But thou hast fully known my doctrine, manner of life, purpose, faith, longsuffering, charity, patience,
verses.web: But you followed my teaching, conduct, purpose, faith, patience, love, steadfastness,
verses.ct: You, however, have closely followed my teaching, my way of life, my purpose, my faith, my patience, my love, and my endurance.

verses.kjv: Persecutions, afflictions, which came unto me at Antioch, at Iconium, at Lystra; what persecutions I endured: but out of them all the Lord delivered me.
verses.web: persecutions, and sufferings: those things that happened to me at Antioch, Iconium, and Lystra. I endured those persecutions. The Lord delivered me out of them all.
verses.ct: You know about the persecutions and sufferings I faced in Antioch, Iconium, and Lystra — the terrible things I endured. Yet the Lord rescued me from every one of them.

verses.kjv: Yea, and all that will live godly in Christ Jesus shall suffer persecution.
verses.web: Yes, and all who desire to live godly in Christ Jesus will suffer persecution.
verses.ct: The truth is, everyone who wants to live a godly life in Christ Jesus will face persecution.

verses.kjv: But evil men and seducers shall wax worse and worse, deceiving, and being deceived.
verses.web: But evil men and impostors will grow worse and worse, deceiving and being deceived.
verses.ct: Meanwhile, evil people and impostors will go from bad to worse, deceiving others and being deceived themselves.

verses.kjv: But continue thou in the things which thou hast learned and hast been assured of, knowing of whom thou hast learned them;
verses.web: But you remain in the things which you have learned and have been assured of, knowing from whom you have learned them.
verses.ct: But you — hold firmly to what you've learned and become convinced of, because you know who taught you these things.

verses.kjv: And that from a child thou hast known the holy scriptures, which are able to make thee wise unto salvation through faith which is in Christ Jesus.
verses.web: From infancy, you have known the holy Scriptures which are able to make you wise for salvation through faith, which is in Christ Jesus.
verses.ct: Since childhood you've known the holy Scriptures, which have the power to make you wise for salvation through faith in Christ Jesus.

verses.kjv: All scripture is given by inspiration of God, and is profitable for doctrine, for reproof, for correction, for instruction in righteousness:
verses.web: Every Scripture is God-breathed and profitable for teaching, for reproof, for correction, and for instruction in righteousness,
verses.ct: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, for correcting errors, for setting things right, and for training in righteousness,

verses.kjv: That the man of God may be perfect, throughly furnished unto all good works.
verses.web: that each person who belongs to God may be complete, thoroughly equipped for every good work.
verses.ct: so that the person who belongs to God may be fully mature and thoroughly equipped for every good work.
